name: Girl in a Dungeon
description:
You're trapped in a dungeon!
Collect coins and activate switches to open the gate and escape!
Watch out for enemies and don't fall into pits!

This game is a submission for the Ludum Dare game jam.
The theme was: "Start with Nothing".
The first dungeon floor is completely void of obstacles, but for every floor you
complete, more obstacles are added!
